definitions.definition: An exposed plumbing fitting ; a tap or spigot ; a regulator for controlling the flow of a liquid from a reservoir.
One or several systems that inject currency into the game's economy, thus controlling or preventing inflation

main_definition: ( Canada , US ) An exposed plumbing fitting ; a tap or spigot ; a regulator for controlling the flow of a liquid from a reservoir.
secondary_definitions: ( game development ) One or several systems that inject currency into the game's economy, thus controlling or preventing inflation
